good quality, it was about DVD quality. The movie itself was slow, and at first I thought it was boring but... its telling the story of these two people, and if you think back to your teenage years Im sure it was somewhat boring as well which lead me to appreciate the raw factor of this film.

 The cast did a good job, and overall if you are looking for a romantic love story or a hollywood entertainment flick take a pass, for now. When you are in the mood to appreciate its rawness and realism, give it a chance.

Don't believe the haters... this movie is amazingly well acted and has a very poignant (albeit sad) story to tell.
I highly recommend!
